common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Use this API to fetch the accounting detail of order.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no access_token in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no partner_id in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no sign in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Invalid promotion ID. The promotion may have been recently added and not mapped to the system yet. Please raise a ticket on Open Platform for further verification.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Missing order_sn. Please include a valid order_sn to get escrow details.

error_list.name: order_not_found
error_list.description: Order SN provided is invalid or does not belong to you. Please enter a valid Order SN.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The request body is not a valid json format

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Invalid or missing page_size parameter , please enter a valid value that is with 1-100, indicating the number of records within a page.

error_list.name: common.error_not_found
error_list.description: supplier order item income not found

params:
{"request_params":[{"name":"order_sn","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"220914R9U7D3C6","key":"hzTMasi","type":"string","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for an order."}],"response_params":[{"name":"response","sample":"","key":"aBYrkTy","type":"object","children":[{"sample":"220725D58XURJS","type":"string","name":"order_sn","key":"HnxcdFJ","description":" Shopee's unique identifier for an order."},{"sample":"xixxixi","type":"string","name":"buyer_user_name","key":"DeyajGE","description":"The username of buyer."},{"sample":"[]","type":"string[]","name":"return_order_sn_list","key":"ATNGwcr","description":"The list of the serial number of return."},{"name":"order_income","sample":"","key":"PeMrmSA","type":"object","children":[{"sample":"100.0","type":"float","name":"escrow_amount","key":"SQHbrDf","description":"

The total amount that the seller is expected to receive for the order and will change before order is completed. 

For non cb sip affiliate shop (new formula): 

escrow_amount= original_cost_of_goods_sold-original_shopee_discount+seller_return_refund+ shopee_discount- voucher_from_seller- seller_coin_cash_back+ buyer_paid_shipping_fee- actual_shipping_fee+ shopee_shipping_rebate+ shipping_fee_discount_from_3pl- reverse_shipping_fee+ rsf_seller_protection_fee_claim_amount- final_return_to_seller_shipping_fee- seller_transaction_fee- service_fee- commission_fee- campaign_fee- shipping_seller_protection_fee_amount- delivery_seller_protection_fee_premium_amount-final_escrow_product_gst- order_ams_commission_fee- escrow_tax-sales_tax_on_lvg-reverse_shipping_fee_sst-shipping_fee_sst-withholding_tax-overseas_return_service_fee-vat_on_imported_goods - withholding_vat_tax - withholding_pit_tax - seller_order_processing_fee + buyer_paid_packaging_fee - trade_in_bonus_by_seller


For cb sip affiliate shop: escrow_amount=escrow_amount_pri * exchange_rate


note: Return refund amount = if adjustable RR, will equal to drc_adjustable_refund

"},{"sample":"99.0","type":"float","name":"buyer_total_amount","key":"AfSpfZH","description":"

The snapshot value of total amount that paid by buyer at checkout moment.

"},{"description":"

The original price of the item before ANY promotion/discount in the listing currency. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1.

","name":"order_original_price","sample":"110.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"XEfRjXf"},{"sample":"139.0","type":"float","name":"original_price","key":"eGnwsM","description":"The original price of the item before ANY promotion/discount in the listing currency. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1."},{"description":"

The total discounted price for this order. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

","name":"order_discounted_price","sample":"100.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"hzGQJpS"},{"description":"

This field value = sum of item unit price.selling price comes from the sum up of each item's unit price. For non-bundle deal case, this value will be same like order_original_price; For bundle deal case, this value will be price of sum of item price before bundle deal promo but after item promo.It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

","name":"order_selling_price","sample":"100.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"wypZact"},{"description":"

The total discount seller provided for this order. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

","name":"order_seller_discount","sample":"10.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"FREaejH"},{"sample":"10.0","type":"float","name":"seller_discount","key":"njbZPHX","description":"Final sum of each item seller discount of a specific order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )"},{"sample":"10.0","type":"float","name":"shopee_discount","key":"RKTsrzp","description":"Final sum of each item Shopee discount of a specific order. This amount will rebate to seller. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate order. )"},{"sample":"10.0","type":"float","name":"voucher_from_seller","key":"QfTrjBt","description":"Final value of voucher provided by Seller for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )"},{"sample":"10.0","type":"float","name":"voucher_from_shopee","key":"zXYMQri","description":"Final value of voucher provided by Shopee for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"coins","key":"mxfeMST","description":"This value indicates the total amount offset when the buyer consumed Shopee Coins upon checkout. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"buyer_paid_shipping_fee","key":"TRdFEHk","description":"The shipping fee paid by buyer. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"buyer_transaction_fee","key":"GYxZWKJ","description":"Tansaction fee paid by buyer for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"cross_border_tax","key":"FMymbfF","description":"

Amount incurred by Buyer for purchasing items outside of home country or region. Amount may change after Return Refund. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"payment_promotion","key":"tbZwiki","description":"The amount offset via payment promotion. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"commission_fee","key":"yQheHdm","description":"

The commission fee charged by Shopee platform if applicable. 


For cb sip affiliate shop: commission_fee=commission_fee_pri * exchange_rate

"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"service_fee","key":"CtRtdAS","description":"

Amount charged by Shopee to seller for additional services.


For cb sip affiliate shop: service_fee=service_fee_pri * exchange_rate


For tw shop, there will be pre-order service fee included

"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"seller_transaction_fee","key":"iWFRpAJ","description":"Tansaction fee paid by seller for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"seller_lost_compensation","key":"fnmNrrd","description":"Compensation to seller in case of lost parcel. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"seller_coin_cash_back","key":"RsJyBjF","description":"Value of coins provided by Seller for purchasing with his or her store for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"escrow_tax","key":"JjTCPnR","description":"Cross-border tax imposed by the Indonesian government on sellers. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )"},{"sample":"10.0","type":"float","name":"estimated_shipping_fee","key":"tnYCSWE","description":"The estimated shipping fee is an estimation calculated by Shopee based on specific logistics courier's standard. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )"},{"sample":"-10.0","type":"float","name":"final_shipping_fee","key":"QRrDsTj","description":"Final adjusted amount that seller has to bear as part of escrow. This amount could be negative or positive. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )"},{"sample":"10.0","type":"float","name":"actual_shipping_fee","key":"XwCZbhA","description":"The final shipping cost of order and it is positive. For Non-integrated logistics channel is 0. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )"},{"description":"

The Service Tax charged on Seller Paid Shipping Fee for forward shipping, based on Malaysia SST regulations for shipping fees on all orders. Definition of Seller Paid Shipping Fee is Actual Shipping Fee subtracted by sum of Shipping Fee Paid by Buyer and Shipping Rebate From Shopee. (Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop)

","name":"shipping_fee_sst","sample":"0.1","type":"float","required":null,"key":"WHJhDZR"},{"description":"

For CB shop, display weight used to calculate actual_shipping_fee for this order.

","required":null,"sample":"500","key":"rkSBpWi","type":"int32","name":"order_chargeable_weight"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"shopee_shipping_rebate","key":"dSHsrzJ","description":"The platform shipping subsidy to the seller. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )"},{"sample":"0.0","name":"shipping_fee_discount_from_3pl","key":"TaxwpC","type":"float","description":"The discount of shipping fee from 3PL. Currently only applicable to ID. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"seller_shipping_discount","key":"ZMJzJyf","description":"The shipping discount defined by seller. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )"},{"sample":"[]","type":"string[]","name":"seller_voucher_code","key":"TRGnwyD","description":"The list of voucher code provided by seller. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"drc_adjustable_refund","key":"DCbxEyE","description":"The adjustable refund amount from Shopee Dispute Resolution Center."},{"sample":"1.0","type":"float","name":"cost_of_goods_sold","key":"ikiwDG","description":"Final amount paid by the buyer for the items in a specific order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"original_cost_of_goods_sold","key":"iaiQpaF","description":"Amount paid by the buyer for the items in a specific order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"original_shopee_discount","key":"MjXJmf","description":"Sum of each item Shopee discount of a specific order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"seller_return_refund","key":"tsafYAZ","description":"Amount returned to Seller in the event of Partial Return."},{"name":"items","sample":"","key":"HJiBRRF","type":"object[]","children":[{"sample":"800062998","type":"int64","name":"item_id","key":"aJMxawx","description":"ID of item"},{"sample":"Product","type":"string","name":"item_name","key":"xNkyjEe","description":"Name of item"},{"sample":" ","type":"string","name":"item_sku","key":"eNsWwhR","description":"A item SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller, sometimes called parent SKU. A seller can offer variations of the same item. For example, the seller could create a fixed-priced listing for a t-shirt design and offer the shirt in different colors and sizes. In this case, each color and size combination is a separate variation. Each variation can have a different quantity and price."},{"sample":" ","type":"string","name":"model_sku","key":"JEGxaEp","description":"A model SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller. The agreed settlement price of items used as settlement basis, amount is in the primary currency. (Only display for CB SIP affiliate shop.)

","name":"original_price_pri","sample":"110.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"kHNJCXj"},{"description":"

For non-bundle deal case, this value will be same like item original_price; For bundle deal case, this value will be price of sum of item price before bundle deal promo but after item promo. The offset of this item when the buyer use Shopee voucher.

If the item is a bundle item the value is \"bundle_deal\", and if a add on deal item, the value is \"add_on_deal\""},{"sample":"0","type":"int64","name":"activity_id","key":"aSJSnRx","description":"If bundle_deal the is id of bundle deal, if add_on_deal this is id of add on deal."},{"sample":"false","type":"boolean","name":"is_main_item","key":"dDwdBMT","description":"Meaning a main or sub item for add_on_deal."},{"sample":"1","type":"int32","name":"quantity_purchased","key":"YZbaTAn","description":"This value indicates the number of identical items purchased at the same time by the same buyer from one listing/item."},{"description":"

","name":"is_b2c_shop_item","sample":"false","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"kGJBGQC"},{"description":"

","name":"ams_commission_fee","sample":"0.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"ydmzMAN"},{"description":"

","name":"item_price_prorated","sample":"","type":"float","required":null,"key":"tRMhyKQ"}]}],"description":"This object contains the detailed breakdown for all the items in this order, including regular items(non-activity) and activity items."},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"escrow_amount_pri","key":"BzeeHEG","description":"

The total amount in the prim currency that the seller is expected to receive for the order and will change before order completed . escrow_amount_pri=original_price_pri-seller_return_refund_pri-commission_fee_pri-service_fee_pri-drc_adjustable_refund_pri.(Only display for cb sip affiliate order. )

"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"buyer_total_amount_pri","key":"mQMZxYM","description":"

The total amount that paid by buyer in the primary currency. (Only display for cb sip affiliate order. )

"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"original_price_pri","key":"bsdhinn","description":"

The original price of the item before ANY promotion/discount in the primary currency. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1.(Only display for cb sip affiliate order. )

"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"seller_return_refund_pri","key":"GCKAAyD","description":"

Amount returned to Seller in the event of Partial Return in the primary currency. (Only display for cb sip affiliate shop. )

"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"commission_fee_pri","key":"QtfspPc","description":"

The commission fee charged by Shopee platform if applicable in the primary currency. (Only display for cb sip affiliate shop. )

"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"service_fee_pri","key":"JKEFCfr","description":"

Amount charged by Shopee to seller for additional services in the primary currency. (Only display for cb sip affiliate shop. )

"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"drc_adjustable_refund_pri","key":"FewWGCh","description":"

The adjustable refund amount from Shopee Dispute Resolution Center in the primary currency after proration. (Only applicable for cb sip affiliate shop.)

"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"string","name":"pri_currency","key":"CmixNRy","description":"

The currency of the country or region where the shop that real seller operates. (Only display for cb sip affiliate shop. )

"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"string","name":"aff_currency","key":"hpimPXj","description":"

The currency of the country or region where shop opened in. (Only display for cb sip affiliate shop. )

"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"exchange_rate","key":"mWifRnE","description":"Exchange rate from primary shop currency to affiliate shop currency."},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"reverse_shipping_fee","key":"KemwzYP","description":"Shopee charges the reverse shipping fee for the returned order.The value of this field will be non-negative."},{"description":"

The Service Tax charged on Reverse Shipping Fee for reverse shipping, based on Malaysia SST regulations for shipping fees on all orders. (Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop)

","name":"reverse_shipping_fee_sst","sample":"0.1","type":"float","required":null,"key":"iDzFEsP"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"final_product_protection","key":"FeZHQyw","description":"

The total amount of product protection purchased during placing an order. 

"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"credit_card_promotion","key":"JRXjMwM","description":"This value indicate the offset via credit card promotion."},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"credit_card_transaction_fee","key":"SkQFfrJ","description":"

This value indicate the total transaction fee.

credit_card_transaction_fee=buyer_transaction_fee+seller_transaction_fee

"},{"sample":"0.0","type":"float","name":"final_product_vat_tax","key":"dmtGHKf","description":"Value-added Tax is required for online purchases based on EU Value-added Tax regulations . (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )"},{"description":"

Value-added Tax for product price is required for online purchases based on EU Value-added Tax regulations. (Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

","name":"final_shipping_vat_tax","sample":"0.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"eYbRYEZ"},{"description":"

The campaign fee charged by Shopee platform. Only available for some local Indonesian shops.

","name":"campaign_fee","sample":"0.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"paSJzik"},{"description":"

The SIP subsidy amount is the difference between the item settlement price set by seller and item price actually paid by buyer. (Only available for CB SIP A Shops)

","name":"sip_subsidy","sample":"0.57","type":"float","required":null,"key":"npSezyY"},{"description":"

The SIP subsidy amount is the difference between the item settlement price set by seller and item price actually paid by buyer. This value is in the primary currency. (Only available for CB SIP A Shops)

","name":"sip_subsidy_pri","sample":"2.8","type":"float","required":null,"key":"adRjdcH"},{"description":"

The insurance claim amount if seller opt in to insurance program. this covers Reverse shipping Fee in the case of RR. As per Jun 2024:
- For ID & MY Local: After Extension on coverage to FSF due to RR. this claim amount will consist of FSF + RSF claim.
- For PH local: This will only cover RSF claim

will be updated if there's any RR/cancellation

","name":"rsf_seller_protection_fee_claim_amount","sample":"","type":"float","required":null,"key":"CNBGSCw"},{"description":"

Service fee charged to seller in MY,ID,PH Local (as per Jun 2024) due to additional program purchased.

","name":"shipping_seller_protection_fee_amount","sample":"","type":"float","required":null,"key":"zWaFrMt"},{"description":"

Goods and Service Tax for product price is required for imported goods (overseas orders) based on Singapore GST regulations. (Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop selling in Singapore)

","name":"final_escrow_product_gst","sample":"4.35","type":"float","required":null,"key":"DPxTMwD"},{"description":"

Goods and Service Tax for shipping fee is required for imported goods (overseas orders) based on Singapore GST regulations. (Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop selling in Singapore.)

","name":"final_escrow_shipping_gst","sample":"0.07","type":"float","required":null,"key":"BpTWRey"},{"description":"

[Currently apply to ID & local orders only] An insurance premium charged to seller at the time parcel is picked up by 3PL for insurance in case of parcel lost/damaged by 3PL.

","name":"delivery_seller_protection_fee_premium_amount","sample":"0.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"TirpwjZ"},{"description":"

Order level adjustment transaction information.

If the order without adjustment, no returned of the field.

","name":"order_adjustment","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"HwDciWG","children":[{"description":"

adjustment transaction amount.

","name":"amount","sample":"10.1","type":"float","required":null,"key":"sKkpyTj"},{"description":"

adjustment transaction complete date.

","name":"date","sample":"1688107565","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"tKxZXnd"},{"description":"

order level adjustment transaction's currency type.

","name":"currency","sample":"TWD","type":"string","required":null,"key":"JjPArWY"},{"description":"

Reason for adjustment. 

Possible cases could be:

- Return Refund deduction or compensation

- logistic issue deduction or compensation

- marketing fee deduction

- payment related fee

","name":"adjustment_reason","sample":" ","type":"string","required":null,"key":"SxpyEcx"}]},{"description":"

Total adjustment made to the order.

","name":"total_adjustment_amount","sample":"10.1","type":"float","required":null,"key":"BsnpBX"},{"description":"

Final income seller can get from this order after deduct the order-level adjustment.

","name":"escrow_amount_after_adjustment","sample":"110.1","type":"float","required":null,"key":"wWPKaw"},{"description":"

The amount of affiliate commission fee for this order. Applicable for orders sold via the Affiliate Program.

","name":"order_ams_commission_fee","sample":"0.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"dcCdszP"},{"description":"

The payment method buyer used when do the order checkout.

","name":"buyer_payment_method","sample":"Credit Card/Debit Card","type":"string","required":null,"key":"fPesdQy"},{"description":"

The instalment plan buyer chosen when do the order checkout. Only applicable when payment method support instalment.

","name":"instalment_plan","sample":"N/A","type":"string","required":null,"key":"wyxRnEY"},{"description":"

Sales Tax on Low Value Goods (LVG) is required for imported goods (overseas orders) based on Malaysia SST regulations for selective orders (e.g. CB LVG orders in MY)

","name":"sales_tax_on_lvg","sample":"0.99","type":"float","required":null,"key":"ewphdNH"},{"description":"

The amount of fee charged to seller (if any) for the failed delivery order.

","name":"final_return_to_seller_shipping_fee","sample":"0.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"QBNTPxN"},{"description":"

Only for PH local shops.

According to regulations issued by Bureau of Internal Revenue in PH, the Withholding Tax is applied to the gross remittances sent by Shopee to online suppliers of goods and services.

","name":"withholding_tax","sample":"0.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"hXtJsZs"},{"description":"

This is overseas return service fee charged to sellers who register ORS program.(Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop)

","name":"overseas_return_service_fee","sample":"0.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"cdBhrjd"},{"description":"

This is the prorated value from cash equivalent of coin offset due to adjustable RR.This field will only be updated when there is an adjustable RR. If it's a full RR or normal order will response 0.

","name":"prorated_coins_value_offset_return_items","sample":"0.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"cKsNDsH"},{"description":"

This is the prorated refund value from shopee voucher discount due to adjustable RR.This field will only be updated when there is an adjustable RR. If it's a full RR or normal order will response 0.

","name":"prorated_shopee_voucher_offset_return_items","sample":"0.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"PEYziJG"},{"description":"

This is the prorated refund value from seller voucher discount due to adjustable RR.This field will only be updated when there is an adjustable RR. If it's a full RR or normal order will response 0.

","name":"prorated_seller_voucher_offset_return_items","sample":"0.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"xDQSjce"},{"description":"

This is the prorated value from bank payment channel promo due to adjustable RR.This field will only be updated when there is an adjustable RR.If it's a full RR or normal order will response 0.

","name":"prorated_payment_channel_promo_bank_offset_return_items","sample":"0.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"WPhThFK"},{"description":"

This is the prorated value from shopee payment channel promo due to adjustable RR.This field will only be updated when there is an adjustable RR.If it's a full RR or normal order will response 0.

","name":"prorated_payment_channel_promo_shopee_offset_return_items","sample":"0.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"xHxAyZM"},{"description":"

The claim amount given to seller if seller opt in to shipping fee service program. this covers Forward Shipping Fee cost in the case of cancelled due to Failed delivery. 

","name":"fsf_seller_protection_fee_claim_amount","sample":"0.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"drBadzr"},{"description":"

7% VAT is charged for imported goods entering Thailand.

8% VAT is charged for imported goods entering Vietnam

","name":"vat_on_imported_goods","sample":"0.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"imkKCH"},{"description":"","name":"tenure_info_list","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"SwWWhxw","children":[{"description":"

Name of the payment channel that buyer used in checkout.

","name":"payment_channel_name","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"QXGDnbM"},{"description":"

Tenure information. This will have value if payment channel used has tenure information, such as credit card.

","name":"instalment_plan","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"dTbJeji"}]},{"description":"

By VN law, E-commerce platforms need to Withhold VAT tax applicable to all VN business household and VN individual sellers

","name":"withholding_vat_tax","sample":"1.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"sQfephX"},{"description":"

By VN law, E-commerce platforms need to Withhold Personal Income Tax applicable to all VN business household and VN individual sellers

","name":"withholding_pit_tax","sample":"2.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"MJeXBkb"},{"description":"

For VN Withholding Tax. This is the Tax Registration Number (TRN) from Seller Info (Business information) of the seller at the point of order creation

","name":"tax_registration_code","sample":"8881234567-888","type":"string","required":null,"key":"riiMKDm"},{"description":"

This displays a breakdown of the service fees. 


Amount charged by Shopee to seller for additional services.


For cb sip affiliate shop: service_fee=service_fee_pri * exchange_rate


For tw shop, there will be pre-order service fee included

","name":"service_fee_info_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"BTeACrH"},{"description":"

This displays a breakdown of the Commission fees.


The commission fee charged by Shopee platform if applicable. 


For cb sip affiliate shop: commission_fee=commission_fee_pri * exchange_rate

","name":"commission_fee_info_list","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"RGhHNKP"},{"description":"

Order Processing Fee is the amount charged to sellers for every order created.

","name":"seller_order_processing_fee","sample":"3.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"bmMbNHk"},{"description":"

The fee charged to the buyer for packaging materials

","name":"buyer_paid_packaging_fee","sample":"","type":"float","required":null,"key":"PEmeEZK"},{"description":"

The discount provided by Seller/ Retailers for buyers who opt for trade-in.

","name":"trade_in_bonus_by_seller","sample":"","type":"float","required":null,"key":"BiAyDWE"}],"description":""},{"description":"

The buyer payment info at order checkout moment. (snapshot value)

","name":"buyer_payment_info","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"rFitHNC","children":[{"description":"

The payment method used by buyer.

","name":"buyer_payment_method","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"WffrdbG"},{"description":"

An additional service fee charged by shopee to Buyer at checkout. currently only applicable to ID region.
it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

","name":"buyer_service_fee","sample":"","type":"float","required":null,"key":"eSGXprk"},{"description":"

The tax amount paid by buyer.

currently this is a custom tax charged to CB orders in TW,CL,MX

","name":"buyer_tax_amount","sample":"","type":"float","required":null,"key":"FwwzFmJ"},{"description":"

The total amount paid by buyer at checkout moment.

","name":"buyer_total_amount","sample":"","type":"float","required":null,"key":"QJKFHJC"},{"description":"

The promotion provided by credit card.
it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

","name":"credit_card_promotion","sample":"","type":"float","required":null,"key":"ZmxFBwY"},{"description":"

The icms tax paid by buyer. this is only applicable to BR region
it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

","name":"icms_tax_amount","sample":"","type":"float","required":null,"key":"rcXXpBJ"},{"description":"

The import tax paid by buyer. 
it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

","name":"import_tax_amount","sample":"","type":"float","required":null,"key":"CeiwTca"},{"description":"

Transaction fee paid by buyer for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. ). Most regions would have this fee charged to buyer at checkout depending on the fee rules applied in each region.
it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

","name":"initial_buyer_txn_fee","sample":"","type":"float","required":null,"key":"JjAshMS"},{"description":"

The insurance premium paid by buyer. Currently only applicable to some regions like PH, MY, ID, VN, SG and TH it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

","name":"insurance_premium","sample":"","type":"float","required":null,"key":"EecAHSN"},{"description":"

The iof tax paid by buyer. 

it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

","name":"iof_tax_amount","sample":"","type":"float","required":null,"key":"inHehif"},{"description":"

Whether this order is paid by credit card. it's related to payment channel used at checkout.

Value: false,true

","name":"is_paid_by_credit_card","sample":"false","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"hyWMpQr"},{"description":"

The total item price paid by buyer at checkout.

it is an initial value and will not be updated after RR/cancellation

","name":"merchant_subtotal","sample":"","type":"float","required":null,"key":"YRmXnsF"},{"description":"

The voucher provided by seller to offset some value needs to be paid by buyer.

it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

","name":"seller_voucher","sample":"","type":"float","required":null,"key":"afNWNyk"},{"description":"

The shipping fee paid by buyer. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. 

it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

","name":"shipping_fee","sample":"","type":"float","required":null,"key":"iNpdjky"},{"description":"

The shipping fee sst paid by buyer. Currently apply to MY region only 

it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

","name":"shipping_fee_sst_amount","sample":"","type":"float","required":null,"key":"frCQsbT"},{"description":"

The voucher provided by Shopee to offset the amount need to be paid by buyer.

it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

","name":"shopee_voucher","sample":"","type":"float","required":null,"key":"yKnhQTR"},{"description":"

This is an amount of coin used by buyer at checkout to offset some amount to be paid. 

it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

","name":"shopee_coins_redeemed","sample":"","type":"float","required":null,"key":"JrNCzeJ"},{"description":"

The fee charged to the buyer for packaging materials

","name":"buyer_paid_packaging_fee","sample":"","type":"float","required":null,"key":"ReZDhjR"},{"description":"

The total amount of all trade-in bonuses applied to a transaction. This value is the summation of the bonuses contributed by all four parties: Shopee, Seller, Bank and Trade-in Partner.

","name":"trade_in_bonus_subtotal","sample":"","type":"float","required":null,"key":"EjXyCWa"},{"description":"

A fee charged to the buyer for the special handling and transportation required for items that exceed a specified weight or dimension threshold. Only for ID local seller

","name":"bulky_handling_fee","sample":"","type":"float","required":null,"key":"ZsrBhZz"}]}],"description":""},{"sample":"10fff653c945a390f8e1323c6bdffff4","type":"string","name":"request_id","key":"RzSmfka","description":"The identifier for an API request for error tracking."},{"sample":" ","type":"string","name":"error","key":"tBasNPr","description":"Error code"},{"sample":" ","type":"string","name":"message","key":"HXfDfXe","description":"Error message"}]}
